text:
Rent increases for those units subject to 
Chapter 37 (Residential Rent Stabilization and Arbitration Ordinance) continue to be governed by the provisions of that chapter. Units not within the scope of that Chapter shall be governed by the terms and conditions of a written lease, if any, and applicable federal, State and local laws and regulations other than 
Chapter 37. 
(Added by Ord. 398-96, App. 10/21/96; amended by Ord. 328-00, File No. 001923, App. 12/28/2000)
